createmonitor.name: CreateMonitor
createmonitor.description: Grants permission to create a monitor

createscope.name: CreateScope
createscope.description: Grants permission to create a scope

deletemonitor.name: DeleteMonitor
deletemonitor.description: Grants permission to delete a monitor

deletescope.name: DeleteScope
deletescope.description: Grants permission to delete a scope

getmonitor.name: GetMonitor
getmonitor.description: Grants permission to get information about a monitor

getqueryresultsmonitortopcontributors.name: GetQueryResultsMonitorTopContributors
getqueryresultsmonitortopcontributors.description: Grants permission to get the results of a query that retrieves top contributors data for a monitor

getqueryresultsworkloadinsightstopcontri.name: GetQueryResultsWorkloadInsightsTopContributors
getqueryresultsworkloadinsightstopcontri.description: Grants permission to get the results of a query that retrieves top contributors for workload insights

getqueryresultsworkloadinsightstopcontri.name: GetQueryResultsWorkloadInsightsTopContributorsData
getqueryresultsworkloadinsightstopcontri.description: Grants permission to get the results of a query that retrieves top contributors data points for workload insights

getquerystatusmonitortopcontributors.name: GetQueryStatusMonitorTopContributors
getquerystatusmonitortopcontributors.description: Grants permission to get the status of a query that retrieves top contributors data for a monitor

getquerystatusworkloadinsightstopcontrib.name: GetQueryStatusWorkloadInsightsTopContributors
getquerystatusworkloadinsightstopcontrib.description: Grants permission to get the status of a query that retrieves top contributors for workload insights

getquerystatusworkloadinsightstopcontrib.name: GetQueryStatusWorkloadInsightsTopContributorsData
getquerystatusworkloadinsightstopcontrib.description: Grants permission to get the status of a query that retrieves top contributors data points for workload insights

getscope.name: GetScope
getscope.description: Grants permission to get information about a scope

listmonitors.name: ListMonitors
listmonitors.description: Grants permission to list all monitors in an account and their statuses

listscopes.name: ListScopes
listscopes.description: Grants permission to get all scopes for an account

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource

publish.name: Publish
publish.description: Grants permission to publish a report

startquerymonitortopcontributors.name: StartQueryMonitorTopContributors
startquerymonitortopcontributors.description: Grants permission to start a query for retrieving top contributors data for a monitor

startqueryworkloadinsightstopcontributor.name: StartQueryWorkloadInsightsTopContributors
startqueryworkloadinsightstopcontributor.description: Grants permission to start a query for retrieving top contributors data for workload insights

startqueryworkloadinsightstopcontributor.name: StartQueryWorkloadInsightsTopContributorsData
startqueryworkloadinsightstopcontributor.description: Grants permission to start a query for retrieving top contributors data points for workload insights

stopquerymonitortopcontributors.name: StopQueryMonitorTopContributors
stopquerymonitortopcontributors.description: Grants permission to stop a query for retrieving top contributors data for a monitor

stopqueryworkloadinsightstopcontributors.name: StopQueryWorkloadInsightsTopContributors
stopqueryworkloadinsightstopcontributors.description: Grants permission to stop a query for retrieving top contributors for workload insights

stopqueryworkloadinsightstopcontributors.name: StopQueryWorkloadInsightsTopContributorsData
stopqueryworkloadinsightstopcontributors.description: Grants permission to stop a query for retrieving top contributors data points for workload insights

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

updatemonitor.name: UpdateMonitor
updatemonitor.description: Grants permission to update a monitor

updatescope.name: UpdateScope
updatescope.description: Grants permission to update a scope
